attributes.review: i am a woman of high class. i expect high class, from the man who owns many establishments and most of all a businessman i would think he would know good apps. apps are the new world and trump failed horribly. this app crashed my phone to the point of it not working anymore and it has put a virus in all my other apps, it took my credit card information without me knowing and bought maga accessories. i do not recommend this app even to my worst enemy.  it has such bad quality and you can tell it was made with extremely lazy coding this app needs to be cancelled now.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: Don’t get me wrong, I support the Trump 2020 campaign for re-election. But this app has some serious issues. After downloading, I noticed how it collected information from my entire phone, including my contacts, private messages, etc. If you want your data to remain private, do not make the same mistake I did!! This app is dangerous.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! After two days of waiting for it to download this app as soon as I opened it it asked me to provide my phone number, social security number, AND credit card information! I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! It is very sketchy and I couldn’t leave the app after they asked for my information without restarting my phone!
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!!!

attributes.review: Downloaded this app and it completely wiped all and any data in my phone Trump related. Not only that but the app is providing false information. On top of all of that i started receiving emails after checking no and also after unsubscribing. Awful app. Apple would be smart to remove immediately.
attributes.title: Do Not Download This App!

attributes.review: The app took DAYS to download and then it took all of my data, my iPad started to glitch and I had to take it to the apple repair store they asked me to give my address and I’m not comfortable with that, I customer service and they said “Go figure it out yourself TRUMP 2020” and they were so rude to me, this has to be taken off the App Store ✨Trump 2020 ✨ But On a burning gravestone 🤡😌
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app overall gave me the creeps first of all it asked for my phone number like I was in need of getting a call from someone second of all people were over all rude on the app if I could give a 0/5 star rating I would, also if you are not  a straight white cis male I would HIGHLY recommend you do NOT download this app
attributes.title: Creepy

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to walk my pet dinosaur. But when I went to find my fish my Dino was a nugget. So naturally I ate it and I gotta tell you goldfish taste immaculate. Then I went out side to walk my Dino nuggie but I forgot it so naturally I took my pet shark but it drounded for some reason. My theory is that this app kill my goldfish and turned my pet worm into Gummi es. Very disappointed 😤
attributes.title: Very disappointed

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. I don’t like the design of it at all and if I could give this 0 stars I would. I don’t understand why I have to give my phone number to this app either! It’s so pointless and I vote that it be taken off the App Store immediately!! No one should have to endure the pain of this app.
attributes.title: Most disgusting app ever! 😾
